import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { public pagamentos!: any[]; public colunas: string[] = ['descricao', 'valor', 'tipoPagamento', 'dataPagamento']; }
Descricao {{element.descricao}} Valor {{element.name}} Weight {{element.weight}} Symbol {{element.symbol}}
